title: Anti-cancer drug isolated from Asian tree promotes weight loss in obese mice
author: Angus Liu
description: Discovered in 1966, the drug camptothecin comes from the Camptotheca tree native to China. | Camptothecin, derived from the Camptotheca tree native to China, is known as a cytotoxic agent with cancer-killing effects. A group of Chinese scientists found the drug also has the potential to tackle obesity.
